channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-1393] NPE when running features:listUrl
item.description:
After a failed attempt to install a FAB using "features:addUrl -i" (the feature didn't install because of a missing dependency), I see this when running features:listUrl:

08 Apr 2014 15:03:13,079 | DEBUG | t-60024-thread-5 | ServiceRecipe | 14 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.0.1.redhat-60024 | Retrieving service for bundle org.apache.karaf.shell.console [15] and service registration org.apache.felix.framework.ServiceRegistrationImpl@4355c538

08 Apr 2014 15:03:13,080 | DEBUG | t-60024-thread-5 | ServiceRecipe | 14 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.0.1.redhat-60024 | Method entry: getService, args org.apache.karaf.shell.console.commands.BlueprintCommand@1932f1d0

08 Apr 2014 15:03:13,080 | DEBUG | l Console Thread | BlueprintContainerImpl | 14 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.0.1.redhat-60024 | Instantiating component shell-61

08 Apr 2014 15:03:13,080 | DEBUG | l Console Thread | BlueprintContainerImpl | 14 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.0.1.redhat-60024 | Instantiating component blueprintBundleContext

08 Apr 2014 15:03:13,080 | DEBUG | t-60024-thread-3 | ServiceRecipe | 14 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.0.1.redhat-60024 | Retrieving service for bundle org.apache.karaf.features.command [38] and service registration org.apache.felix.framework.ServiceRegistrationImpl@3216d4bd

08 Apr 2014 15:03:13,080 | DEBUG | t-60024-thread-3 | ServiceRecipe | 14 - org.apache.aries.blueprint.core - 1.0.1.redhat-60024 | Method entry: getService, args org.apache.karaf.features.internal.FeaturesServiceImpl@23081b81

08 Apr 2014 15:03:13,081 | INFO | l Console Thread | Console | 15 - org.apache.karaf.shell.console - 2.3.0.redhat-60024 | Exception caught while executing command

java.lang.NullPointerException

at org.apache.karaf.features.command.ListUrlCommand.doExecute(ListUrlCommand.java:55)[38:org.apache.karaf.features.command:2.3.0.redhat-60024]

at org.apache.karaf.features.command.FeaturesCommandSupport.doExecute(FeaturesCommandSupport.java:41)[38:org.apache.karaf.features.command:2.3.0.redhat-60024]

at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.OsgiCommandSupport.execute(OsgiCommandSupport.java:38)[15:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.3.0.redhat-60024]

at org.apache.felix.gogo.commands.basic.AbstractCommand.execute(AbstractCommand.java:35)[15:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.3.0.redhat-60024]

at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.CommandProxy.execute(CommandProxy.java:78)[15:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.3.0.redhat-60024]

at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.execute(Closure.java:183)[15:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.3.0.redhat-60024]

at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.execute(Closure.java:120)[15:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.3.0.redhat-60024]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Fixed at Apache (see https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KARAF-2899)
